solution_line_template: After the discount, the price will be ${price_per_person} - {discount_per_person} = $<<{price_per_person}-{discount_per_person}={price_after_discount}>>{price_after_discount}.
For both Ali and Leila together, it will cost ${price_after_discount}* {num_people} = $<<{price_after_discount}*{num_people}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}.
